constitutionalAuthorityStatementText:
[Congressional Record Volume 167, Number 188 (Tuesday, October 26, 2021)]
[House]
From the Congressional Record Online through the Government Publishing Office [www.gpo.gov]
By Ms. HERRELL:
H.R. 5733.
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Congress has the power to enact this legislation pursuant
to the following:
Article I, Section 8 of the United States Constitution.
[Page H5931]

latestAction.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Water, Oceans, and Wildlife.

title: To codify a final rule of the United States Fish and Wildlife Service relating to the designation of critical habitat under the Endangered Species Act of 1973.
